div.script: (function($){function shuffle(arr) {for (var j, x, i = arr.length; i;j = parseInt(Math.random() * i),x = arr[--i], arr[i] = arr[j], arr[j] = x);return arr;}var cnt = 0, $mastheads = $("#mastheads");var imgs = ["/pages/mastheads_L10/Newman%20MIddle%20School.jpg","/pages/mastheads_L10/Skiatook%20High%20School.jpg","/pages/mastheads_L10/Skiatook%20Elementary.jpg","/pages/mastheads_L10/Brooks%20Walton%20Activity%20Center.jpg","/pages/mastheads_L10/Skiatook%20Intermediate%20Elementary.jpg","/pages/mastheads_L10/Marrs%20Elementary.jpg"];var links = [];if (imgs.length > 10) cnt = 10; else cnt = imgs.length; var obj = {};for (var i=0; i<imgs.length; i++) {obj[imgs[i]] = links[i];}imgs = shuffle(imgs);for (var i=0; i<cnt; i++) {if (obj[imgs[i]]) {$mastheads.append('<\/a>');} else {$mastheads.append('');}}$(function() {if ($mastheads.length) {$mastheads.nivoSlider({effect: 'random',slices: 30,boxCols: 8,boxRows: 4,animSpeed: 500,pauseTime: 10000,directionNav: 0,controlNav: 0,keyboardNav: 0,pauseOnHover: 1});}});})(jQuery);

a.aria-label: Read more about Student Distance Learning Packet Pickup Information

h3.a: Distance Learning Lesson Plans (April 6, 2020 to May 15, 2020)

span.span: Prioritizing the safety and health of the school community, the Oklahoma State Board of Education has suspended all in-school activities for the remainder of the school year in order to contain community spread of COVID-19. Beginning April 6, 2020, Skiatook Public Schools will establish distance delivery methods for learning until the end of the school year.

Distance learning is any method of learning that happens outside the traditional school building. At Skiatook Public Schools, distance learning will consist of a blended model that includes virtual or non-virtual components. The components in this plan follow the guidance provided by the Oklahoma State Department of Education. Virtual instruction will take place in the homes of students that have internet connectivity and device access. Non-virtual instruction will take place in the homes of students that lack internet connection and/or devices through the dissemination of instructional packets.
Components of instruction are explained in the SPS Distance Learning Plan Sp 2020 document.
